sentences.en: A few years later, Katya succumbed to cancer in London.
sentences.cn: 几年后，卡佳因患癌症在伦敦病逝。

sentences.en: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.cn: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.en: He was nursed in London.
sentences.cn: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.en: Her Irish accent, after thirty-odd years in London, is undiluted.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦呆了30多年，爱尔兰口音仍很浓重。

sentences.en: I arrived just in time for my flight to London.
sentences.cn: 我及时赶上了飞往伦敦的航班。

sentences.en: I trained to London.
sentences.cn: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.en: I've quite forgotten how closed in London can seem.
sentences.cn: 我都快忘了，伦敦有时看上去会多么地闭塞。

sentences.en: If I were you, I would not go to London tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你，我明天就不去伦敦。（婉转的建议）

sentences.en: Perhaps you would like to pay a visit to London.
sentences.cn: 也许，您乐意去游览一下伦敦。

sentences.en: St Bartholomew's is one of four London hospitals facing the axe.
sentences.cn: 圣巴塞洛缪医院是伦敦4个面临关闭的医院之一。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office in London has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 位于伦敦的英国外交部对这些说法表示惊讶.

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: The London Evening Standard moved offices a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 《伦敦标准晚报》报址几年前迁走了。

sentences.en: The number of commuters to London has dropped by 100,000.
sentences.cn: 往返于伦敦的上班族减少了10万。

sentences.en: The Strand is one of London's busiest and most affluent streets.
sentences.cn: 斯特兰德街是伦敦最繁华、最富足的街道之一。

sentences.en: Their ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
sentences.cn: 他们依然很熟悉伦敦市郊的喧闹声。

sentences.en: Traffic into London on the M11 was backed up for several miles.
sentences.cn: 进入伦敦的车辆在11号高速公路上堵了好几英里。

sentences.en: Well, then -- supposing them to be in London.
sentences.cn: 那么就假定他们在伦敦吧。

sentences.en: What drew him to the area was its proximity to central London.
sentences.cn: 吸引他到该地区的原因是那里靠近伦敦市中心。

sentences.en: You have to hurdle to London and get the intelligence back.
sentences.cn: 你得克服困难到达伦敦把那份情报取回来。

sentences.en: You see studs on lots of London front doors.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦，你能看到许多人家的大门上都装有饰钉。

phrases.tran_cn: 伦敦俱乐部（核燃料供应国集团）
伦敦塔（位于英国伦敦泰晤士北岸的古堡，古代曾先后作为皇宫及监狱，现为兵械库和博物馆）
